dict.acceptation: 上（船、车或飞机）；收费供…膳宿；使搭伙，使寄宿；强行登（船）；
（火车、轮船、飞机等）接受乘客；搭伙，寄宿；

sent.orig: In this contract, Board shall mean the board of director of the joint venture.
sent.trans: 在本合同中，Board指的是本合资企业的董事会。

sent.orig: The features of board include size, board constitution, frequency board meeting and board leading structure.
sent.trans: 董事会的特征主要包括董事会的规模，董事会的构成，董事会会议的频率和董事会的领导结构等。

sent.orig: Gang expresses, board won't affect board capital, board company future upgrades likely board.
sent.trans: 姚刚表示，创业板不会影响主板资金，创业板企业未来有可能升级到主板。

sent.orig: Gang says, roll out board right board market impact is not big, won't billabong board capital.
sent.trans: 姚刚说，推出创业板对主板市场影响不大，不会分流主板资金。

sent.orig: PCB board design, system board, the board copy.
sent.trans: PCB板设计，制板，抄板。单片机开发。
